name: Cheetah Simulator (itch)
description:
Enter into the wild savanna and live the life of a Cheetah! Explore a vast grassy plain filled with ferocious animals of all shapes and sizes.

Game Controls:

WASD to move, click buttons to attack and use skills.

Remember to follow me! Thank you!
